subject: Amateur Athletics
Crime and Criminals
Frauds and Swindling
lead_paragraph: The Miami-Dade state attorney’s office has filed a first-degree misdemeanor charge against the former owner of a Miami correspondence school that provided fast and easy grades to top high school athletes.
snippet: The Miami-Dade state attorney’s office has filed a first-degree misdemeanor charge against the former owner of a Miami correspondence school that provided fast and easy grades to top high school athletes.
